00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Init
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : David S. Whyte [david(at)ihpc.a-star.edu.sg]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00014 
00015 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00029 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 
00031  SUBROUTINE Init
00032 
00033 ! Common Variables
00034  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00035  USE Domain
00036  USE FluidParams
00037  USE LBMParams, ONLY : Eg0, Eg1, Eg2, f, g
00038  IMPLICIT NONE
00039 
00040 ! Local Variables
00041  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js, m, xs, ys
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: R, rhon, phin, muPhi, lapPhi
00043  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Af0, Af1
00044  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Ag0, Ag1, Eg1A, Eg2A
00045 
00046 ! Initialize counters
00047  now   = 0
00048  nxt   = 1
00049  iStep = 0
00050  tCall = 1
00051  eps   = 1.D0
00052 
00053 ! Set vtk limits
00054  NX = xmax - xmin + 1
00055  NY = ymax - ymin + 1
00056 
00057  NX_f = xmax_f - xmin_f + 1
00058  NY_f = ymax_f - ymin_f + 1
00059 
00060 ! Set initial average density
00061  rhon = 0.5D0*(rhoH + rhoL)
00062 
00063 !--------- Initialize the order parameter and near neigbor list ----------------
00064  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00065    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00066 
00067 ! Initialize phi assuming heavy fluid is continuous phase
00068       phi_f(i,j) = -phistar
00069       DO m = 1, nBubbles
00070         R =  DSQRT( (DBLE(i)-bubbles(m,1))**2 + (DBLE(j)-bubbles(m,2))**2 )
00071         IF ( R <= (DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) + IntWidth) ) THEN
00072           phi_f(i,j) = phistar*TANH( 2.D0*( DBLE(bubbles(m,3)) - R )/IntWidth )
00073         END IF
00074       END DO
00075 
00076 ! Assign near neigbors
00077       ni_f(i,j,1) = i + 1
00078       ni_f(i,j,2) = j + 1
00079       ni_f(i,j,3) = i - 1
00080       ni_f(i,j,4) = j - 1
00081 
00082     END DO
00083  END DO
00084 ! Correct near neighbours at domain edges (periodic boundary conditions)
00085  ni_f(xmin_f,:,3) = xmax_f
00086  ni_f(xmax_f,:,1) = xmin_f
00087  ni_f(:,ymin_f,4) = ymax_f
00088  ni_f(:,ymax_f,2) = ymin_f
00089 
00090 
00091 !---------- Initialize the order parameter distribution function f -------------
00092  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00093    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00094 
00095 ! Local value of the order parameter
00096      phin  = phi_f(i,j)
00097 
00098 ! Identify near neigbors
00099      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00100      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00101      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00102      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00103 
00104 ! Laplacian of the order parameter
00105      lapPhi_f(i,j) = ( phi_f(ie,jn) + phi_f(ie,js) + phi_f(iw,jn)    &
00106                    + phi_f(iw,js) + 4.D0*( phi_f(ie,j) + phi_f(iw,j) &
00107                    + phi_f(i,jn) + phi_f(i,js) ) - 20.D0*phin )*inv6
00108 
00109 ! Local value of the chemical potential
00110      muPhi = alpha4*phin*( phin*phin - phistar2 ) - kappa*lapPhi_f(i,j)
00111 
00112 ! Equilibrium coefficients
00113      Af1 = 0.5D0*Gamma*muPhi
00114      Af0 = -2.D0*Gamma*muPhi
00115 
00116 ! Equilibrium distribution for zero initial velocity
00117      f(i,j,0)   = Af0 + phin
00118      f(i,j,1:4) = Af1
00119 
00120    END DO
00121  END DO
00122 
00123 !---------- Initialize g, neighbors in momentum mesh, pressure and velocity ----
00124  DO j = ymin, ymax
00125    DO i = xmin, xmax
00126 
00127 ! Identify near neighbors
00128       ni(i,j,1) = i + 1
00129       ni(i,j,2) = j + 1
00130       ni(i,j,3) = i - 1
00131       ni(i,j,4) = j - 1
00132 
00133 ! Define source nodes in the order parameter mesh
00134      xs = 2*i - 1
00135      ys = 2*j - 1
00136 
00137 ! Local values of the phase and the chemical potential
00138      phin   = phi_f(xs,ys)
00139      lapPhi = 4.D0*lapPhi_f(xs,ys)
00140      muPhi  = alpha4*phin*( phin*phin - phistar2 ) - kappaG*lapPhi
00141 
00142 ! Coefficients
00143       Ag1  = rhon + 3.D0*phin*muPhi
00144       Ag0  = 2.25D0*rhon - 1.25D0*Ag1
00145       Eg1A = Eg1*Ag1
00146       Eg2A = Eg2*Ag1
00147 
00148 ! Equilibrium distribution for zero initial velocity
00149       g(i,j,0,now)   = Eg0*Ag0
00150       g(i,j,1:4,now) = Eg1A
00151       g(i,j,5:8,now) = Eg2A
00152 
00153 ! Initialize pressure and velocity arrays
00154       p(i,j)   = 1.D0
00155       u(i,j,:) = 0.D0
00156 
00157    END DO
00158  END DO
00159 ! Correct near neighbours at domain edges (periodic boundary conditions)
00160  ni(xmin,:,3) = xmax
00161  ni(xmax,:,1) = xmin
00162  ni(:,ymin,4) = ymax
00163  ni(:,ymax,2) = ymin
00164 
00165 ! Calculate differential terms needed in Collision
00166  CALL Differentials
00167 
00168 ! Save initialized data
00169  CALL Stats
00170  CALL VtkPlane
00171 
00172  RETURN
00173  END SUBROUTINE Init
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:52 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR by  1.5.6
